precondition: The "Program Manager" window is open and the "Main" program group is visible.
action: Double Left Click on the "Control Panel" icon.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and the "Printers" icon is highlighted.
action: Click the "Date/Time" icon in the Control Panel window.

precondition: The "Printers" window of the Windows 3.1 Control Panel is open. The "List of Printers: Install Unlisted or Updated Printer" list box is visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the vertical scroll bar of the "List of Printers: Install Unlisted or Updated Printer" list box.
expected_results: The list of printer models will scroll down, revealing additional options.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open in the Control Panel.
action: Move the mouse pointer away from the "Install..." button.
expected_results: The "Install..." button will become inactive and grayed out.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open. The "List of Printers" box shows a list of available printers. A scroll bar is present on the right side of the "List of Printers" box.
action: Click the down arrow button located on the scroll bar of the "List of Printers" box.
expected_results: The "List of Printers" box will scroll down, revealing a new set of printer names.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open. The "List of Printers:" list box is visible.
action: Scroll down the "List of Printers:" list box using the vertical scroll bar.
expected_results: Additional printer models, including several Epson models, will appear in the "List of Printers:" list box.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open. The desired printer "HP LaserJet" is selected in the "List of Printers:" list box.
expected_results: The "Printers" window will update to show "HP LaserJet" in the "Installed Printers:" list. The "Set As Default Printer" and "Remove" buttons will become active.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open and the "List of Printers" is visible.
expected_results: A new printer, "HP LaserJet", will be added to the "List of Printers" and the "Set As Default Printer" button will become active.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open with the "List of Printers" box visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the vertical scroll bar located on the "List of Printers" box.
expected_results: The list of printers in the "List of Printers" box will scroll down.
